subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: U.C.L.A.’s all-American freshman Kevin Love and Brandon Rush and Darrell Arthur of N.C.A.A. champion Kansas announced Thursday that they would enter the N.B.A. draft. Love led the Bruins in scoring (17.5 points) and rebounds (10.6) on the way to a 35-win season. Rush, a 6-foot-6 junior guard, averaged 13.3 points, helping Kansas to its third national title. Arthur, a 6-9 sophomore forward, has not signed with an agent, meaning he can return to Kansas.
